code: var TOKEN_KEY='MUSIC_PRODUCTION_TOKEN';export var setToken=function setToken(token){localStorage.setItem(TOKEN_KEY,"bearer ".concat(token));};export var getToken=function getToken(){return localStorage.getItem(TOKEN_KEY);};export var removeToken=function removeToken(){localStorage.removeItem(TOKEN_KEY);};export var isLogin=function isLogin(){if(localStorage.getItem(TOKEN_KEY)){return true;}return false;};
